attributes.action: Stop the media using scare tactics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
During the fuel tanker strikes, the media make out that all of the petrol stations are affected. Then they have headlines saying a certain food gives you cancer. If you read the story, you find out the chance of getting cancer from eating this product is if you eat 500g of it a day for 3 years. 

Some people do get worried over the media's scare tactics. These people may not understand this as have a low intelligence.

The media should stop using scare tactics for headlines and stop making mountains out of molehills
